name: Cat Console
subtitle: cat scratcher | console table
description:
Perfect for any room in your home and ideal for small spaces! This dual-purpose console attaches to any wall for support, providing a sleek and functional solution for keeping important items at hand while giving your modern kitty the ultimate place to perch and scratch.

We offer custom-fit scratch pad surfaces that are replaceable if they become worn or if you want to change the color to switch up your décor.

Can't find the color or style Scratch Pad you need? Please inquire for additional options.

scratch2.title: Additional Scratch Pad - Includes Hardware
scratch2.description: Can't find the color or style Scratch Pad you need? Please inquire for additional options.

details.title: Features
content: Hand crafted with Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Scratch Pad - Soft, low-profile loop surface
Easy installation – wall mounting hardware included

details.title: Specifications
content: Open Cubby: 19 ¾"W x 7 ½"D x 6"H

details.title: Shipping
content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote
